snippet: Under pressure after the release of video of a white officer shooting a black teenager, Mayor Rahm Emanuel, in a shift, said that the city would release video from another police shooting.
abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel says city will release video from police shooting of Ronald Johnson in October of 2014, reversing course due to pressure from public in wake of release of video of police shooting of Laquan McDonald eight days later.
lead_paragraph: Under pressure after the release of video of a white officer shooting a black teenager, Mayor Rahm Emanuel, in a shift, said that the city would release video from another police shooting.

headline.main: Illinois: Chicago to Release Second Police Video
